Articles.Content:
Hello

I have a weird graphical glitch 

That's all. I heard that I may need the log file, but who cares? I can't upload it, you can't no one can't!

Need I remind you that I don't have any graphical mods, such as, EVE and Astronomer's Visual Pack.

Oh yeah, mod list:

9 hours ago, I likeOxidizerrfuel said:

Oh yeah, mod list: 

A pic would help a lot. More than a log, maybe.

1 hour ago, 5thHorseman said:

A pic would help a lot. More than a log, maybe.

The post is ironic, making fun of bug reports posted with insufficient logs/screenshots
